ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Lute in Velk Lab
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Meldodic whositz? Can someone who actually plays go through my instrument list the next time I post the FAQ?  In fact- would everyone please read the FAQ?
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:21 AM 12/29/00 -0500, you wrote:
>I got one the other week, but I've been too focused on getting level 55 to
>test it. I'll try it this
>weekend if I can. It's a lute, so it's a string instrument (I gather). I
>haven't used it for anything
>but the effect though. Two cool things: the werewolf illusion gives a
>STR bonus (unlike some of the
>illusion masks, which give nothing other than the illusion), and it equips
>in the primary hand, so you can
>equip the Lute of the Howler and the off-hand mesmerizing Lute (Melodic
>Truncheon?) and attack with two
>Lutes at once! Dueling banjos! hehe.


Meldodic whositz?

Can someone who actually plays go through my instrument list the next time
I post the FAQ? In fact- would everyone please read the FAQ? Not because
it's full of great information (which it is), but also because I need your
help updating it...

Thanks!
Talies the overworked
